level.heading: “Secretary of Labor” defined.
level.text: As used or referred to in this subchapter the term “the Secretary of Labor” shall mean the administrator of that department or agency of the United States government authorized to administer the provisions of Public Law No. 308 (29 U.S.C. §§ 50 -50b ).

level.heading: Emergency legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2(k) of the Apprenticeship Modernization Emergency Amendment Act of 2014 (D.C. Act 20-579, Jan. 13, 2015, 62 DCR 1258, 21 STAT 724).
